\n \n \n Test EG5 ecommerce UI\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Test EG5 ecommerce UI
open${base_url}/portal_tests/erp5_web_e5g_ecommerce_ui_zuite/testE5gEcommerce_PreferenceReset
assertTextPresentReset Successfully.
open${base_url}/portal_skins/erp5_hal_json_style/ERP5Site_reindexSkinList/
assertTextPresentskins ok
open${base_url}/Zuite_waitForActivities?count=5000
open${base_url}/portal_tests/erp5_web_e5g_ecommerce_ui_zuite/testE5gEcommerce_CreateDataSample
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully
open${base_url}/web_site_module/e5g_ecommerce/
waitForTextPresentE-COMMERCE
verifyText//span[@data-i18n="E-COMMERCE"]E-COMMERCE
pause5000
storeEvalfunction x(el){var n,a=[],w=document.createTreeWalker(el,NodeFilter.SHOW_TEXT,{acceptNode:function(m){if(!/^\\\\s*$/.test(m.data)){return NodeFilter.FILTER_ACCEPT;}}},false);while(n=w.nextNode())a.push(n);return a;}var i,len,t="",list=x(document.getElementById("selenium_myiframe").contentDocument.querySelector("body div"));for(i=0,len=list.length;i<len;i++){t+=list[i].nodeValue+" "}my_global_text
echo${my_global_text}
waitForTextPresentSuper Product
verifyText//h2Super Product 0
\n \n
